title: The Most Popular Drinks on Dutch Bros Secret Menu

steps.title: Snickerdoodle Breve:
steps.content: Snickerdoodle Breve: Spice up a classic Dutch Bros coffee by ordering a Breve blended with white chocolate sauce, chocolate macadamia nut syrup, and cinnamon syrup. It’s sure to make your taste buds tingle!

steps.title: Caramel Nog:
steps.content: Caramel Nog: This delightfully creamy and festive drink is perfect for cold winter mornings. Order a regular caramel americano but substitute the cream with eggnog.

steps.title: The Fleck:
steps.content: The Fleck: Wrap yourself in a warm hug with this surprisingly tasty combination of flavors. Add white chocolate, coconut, and hazelnut to a Breve to make this delicious beverage.

steps.title: Islander Breve:
steps.content: Islander Breve: Bring the vacation to work with this frozen or hot beverage. Order a standard Breve with chocolate macadamia nut, vanilla, and coconut syrups.

steps.title: Golden Eagle Breve:
steps.content: Golden Eagle Breve: Like a caramel macchiato, this coffee is full of caramel flavor. Order a hot, iced, or blended espresso with vanilla syrup, caramel sauce, and a caramel drizzle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: White Zombie Breve:
steps.content: White Zombie Breve: This coffee is perfect for when you’re dead tired. Ask for a Vanilla White Chocolate Breve to get a revitalizing combination of flavors that’s to die for hot or iced.

steps.title: The Grasshopper Mocha:
steps.content: The Grasshopper Mocha: If you love chocolate and mint, this is the perfect drink for you! Served hot, iced, or blended, this snappy coffee can be ordered by name or by asking for an espresso with creme de menthe and dark chocolate. Turn this beverage into the Ninja by requesting white chocolate mocha instead of dark chocolate.

steps.title: Kicker Cold Brew:
steps.content: Kicker Cold Brew: This drink puts a twist on a classic cold brew to give you an energy boost. Order a nitro cold brew with Irish cream on top for a sweeter and fuller taste.

steps.title: French Toast Breve:
steps.content: French Toast Breve: This sweet coffee is best served hot and packs all the cinnamony goodness of your favorite breakfast food. Order an espresso shot with cinnamon, melted white chocolate, and foam.

steps.title: White Coffee Cookie:
steps.content: White Coffee Cookie: Cookies aren’t just for dessert—they also pair wll with coffee! To make this extremely sweet drink, ask the broista for a regular Breve with white chocolate and chocolate macadamia nut.

steps.title: Toasted Mellow Mocha:
steps.content: Toasted Mellow Mocha: This coffee is great for sipping by the campfire or at work. Simply ask for a cold brew with vanilla syrup, chocolate macadamia nut syrup, and chocolate milk.

steps.title: Molten Lava Mocha:
steps.content: Molten Lava Mocha: Why chew your dessert when you can drink it? This decadent frozen coffee can be ordered by name and is full of cinnamon and mocha flavor.

steps.title: Gummy Bear Rebel:
steps.content: Gummy Bear Rebel: This sweet and energizing drink is the perfect midday pickup. Order a Blue Rebel with white chocolate, kiwi, and lime.

steps.title: Double Rainbro:
steps.content: Double Rainbro: This fruity drink packs an energetic punch that’ll make you see rainbows. Ask the broista for a Rebel energy drink with a strawberry, peach, and coconut syrups blend.

steps.title: Laser Cat Rebel:
steps.content: Laser Cat Rebel: Marketed as an out-of-this-world experience, this drink is stellar! Ask for a Rebel with raspberry and coconut syrups, and order it blended or iced.

steps.title: Shark Attack Rebel:
steps.content: Shark Attack Rebel: A trifecta of colors, this drink is full of tropical flavor and caffeine. Combining blue raspberry, coconut, and lime syrups with a pomegranate syrup drizzle, this drink can be ordered by name iced or blended. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Unicorn Blood Blended Rebel:
steps.content: Unicorn Blood Blended Rebel: Colorful, frozen, and tasty—what more could you ask for? Order this sweet treat by asking for a blended Rebel energy drink with strawberry syrup, almond syrup, and white chocolate sauce.

steps.title: Ray of Sunshine:
steps.content: Ray of Sunshine: This sweetly tart drink is packed with flavor and caffeine. Simply ask for an iced Rebel with blackberry, peach, and grapefruit syrup. [3] X Research source

steps.title: King of Leon:
steps.content: King of Leon: This drink is as powerful as it sounds. Ask for this beverage by name, or order a Rebel over ice with orange, lime, and kiwi syrups.

steps.title: The Cherry Blossom:
steps.content: The Cherry Blossom: This blended beverage is sweet, tart, and perfect for springtime. Order the drink by name, or ask your barista for a white chocolate and cherry blended Rebel.

steps.title: Ba-Nay-Nay:
steps.content: Ba-Nay-Nay: Do you love banana bread and chocolate? If so, this is the drink for you! Ask for the drink by name to experience this dark chocolate and banana mocha milkshake.

steps.title: Pink Flamingo Frost:
steps.content: Pink Flamingo Frost: Bright pink and topped with whipped cream, this frozen beverage tastes as good as it looks! Ask for a vanilla milkshake with white chocolate, strawberry, and peach. This drink was previously known as Skittles Frost.

steps.title: Birthday Cake:
steps.content: Birthday Cake: Who says you can only eat cake on your birthday? Not us! Try this sweet frozen milkshake by ordering it by name or asking the broista to blend vanilla ice cream with whipped almond roca and white chocolate.

steps.title: Cotton Candy Frost:
steps.content: Cotton Candy Frost: Looking for a nostalgic, super sweet treat? Order this frozen caffeine-free beverage by asking for a classic Frost with white chocolate and blue raspberry.

steps.title: Bob Marley:
steps.content: Bob Marley: Best served frozen, this tropical drink will have you spreading good vibes. Just ask for a Cocomo (a blend of coconut syrup, chocolate milk, and espresso) with a banana blended in.

steps.title: Trifecta Freeze:
steps.content: Trifecta Freeze: This blended coffee drink will surely put a pep in your step! Ask for a Freeze with dark chocolate, white chocolate, and caramel, and don’t forget the chocolate drizzle and whipped cream.

steps.title: Picture Perfect:
steps.content: Picture Perfect: This blended coffee is definitely Instagram-worthy. Order this decadent coffee by name, and don’t forget to ask for whipped cream and extra caramel and chocolate syrup. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Majestic Forest:
steps.content: Majestic Forest: This drink’s lavender color and berry-packed flavor will ignite your imagination. Just order a regular lemonade with blackberry, blue raspberry, and kiwi syrups, and enjoy it iced or blended.

steps.title: Tiger’s Blood Lemonade:
steps.content: Tiger’s Blood Lemonade: Why have 1 lemonade when you can have 2? Ask the broista to mix strawberry and coconut lemonades together to make this tartly sweet drink.

steps.title: Palm Beach Lemonade:
steps.content: Palm Beach Lemonade: Full of edible sparkles, this drink dazzles the eyes and taste buds! This lemonade is packed with pomegranate and peach flavors and can be ordered by name.

steps.title: Electric Berry Green Tea:
steps.content: Electric Berry Green Tea: Who can resist the radioactive color of this berry-packed beverage? Not only is it electrifying to look at, but it also packs a powerful caffeine punch. Simply ask for an iced green tea with lime and blue raspberry.

steps.title: Christmas Morning Chai:
steps.content: Christmas Morning Chai: Need a break from coffee but still want that caffeine kick? Try ordering a White Chocolate Chai Latte from the menu (hot or iced) with cinnamon.

steps.title: Raspberry Vanilla Chai:
steps.content: Raspberry Vanilla Chai: Enjoyed hot or iced, this chai beverage is a pretty pink color full of sweet flavor. Order the drink by name, and enjoy this fruity twist on a classic drink.

steps.title: Marmalade Paris Tea:
steps.content: Marmalade Paris Tea: Drinking 1 tea is boring—try having 3! This refreshing citrusy beverage combines orange, ruby red grapefruit, and strawberry flavored teas, and we highly recommend it iced.

steps.title: Dirty Caterpillar:
steps.content: Dirty Caterpillar: The name may not sound appetizing, but this smoothie is full of deliciously classic fall flavors. Order a green apple and caramel smoothie with whipped cream and caramel drizzle to make this delightfully tart concoction.
